headline.main: Agassi and McEnroe to Play at Connecticut Open

snippet: Andre Agassi and John McEnroe have agreed to play this summer in New Haven, which has been added as a stop on the PowerShares Series circuit for over-30 men’s players.
lead_paragraph: Andre Agassi and John McEnroe have agreed to play this summer in New Haven, which has been added as a stop on the PowerShares Series circuit for over-30 men’s players.
